description:
Please don't take this course if you are an experienced Adobe Illustrator user. You might be disappointed and end up leaving me a bad review :)

--------------------------------------------

Affinity Designer is the hottest vector drawing tool. Jump on quick to get a head start learning this amazing tool that is being touted as an Adobe Illustrator "killer". Watch me as I teach you to use the tool by recreating various professional designs using Affinity Designer.

Affinity Designer is the fastest, smoothest, most precise vector graphic design software available. Whether youâ€™re working on graphics for marketing materials, websites, icons, UI design or just like creating cool concept art, Affinity Designer will revolutionise how you work.

In this course you will watch as we use all the tools you would expect from a professional vector design app, including:

  • Node Tool
  • Pen Tool
  • Pencil Tool
  • Vector Brush
  • Gradient Fill Tool
  • Transparency Tool
  • Crop Tool
  • Targeted Insert
  • Text
  • Alignment Guides

This course provides tutorials for learning Affinity Designer.
title: Learn Affinity Designer by Example for Beginners
